entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is a teacher at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. She is described as having her eyes following the bouncing ferret's progress through the air.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: Moody is a teacher at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is described as teaching using Transfiguration as a punishment.

entities.name: draco malfoy
entities.description: Draco Malfoy is a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is described as being punished by Moody using Transfiguration.

entities.name: professor dumbledore
entities.description: Professor Dumbledore is the headmaster of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is mentioned as having told Moody not to use Transfiguration as a punishment.

entities.name: harry potter's school (hogwarts)
entities.description: Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry is the school attended by Draco Malfoy. It is described as having professors like McGonagall and Moody.

relationships.description: Moody punishes Draco Malfoy using Transfiguration.
Professor McGonagall disapproves of Moody's use of Transfiguration as a punishment.
